sentences.en: And may it bring you great joy, great understanding, and great transcendence.
sentences.cn: 且让它带给你巨大的快乐, 巨大的理解, 和巨大的超越.

sentences.en: Forget the stone barns with the dandrutty guys in suede shoes droning on about transcendence.
sentences.cn: 无需那些石头仓库,无需那些穿软羔皮鞋、满头皮屑的家伙没完没了地讲超越.

sentences.en: He had demonstrated to all those obsessed with the tangible the transcendence of visionary.
sentences.cn: 他向所有那些纠缠于眼前事物的人们显示了他的远见卓识.

sentences.en: It has the characteristics of contradiction ( mixture ), motion, transcendence ( morality ).
sentences.cn: 它具有矛盾性 ( 混杂性 ) 、 运动性 、 超越性 ( 道德性 ) 特征.

sentences.en: It is through transcendence that freedom from karmic relations is found.
sentences.cn: 正是通过超越,才得到了摆脱业力关系的自由.

sentences.en: Its realization needs the external rational resource regulation and the internal self transcendence.
sentences.cn: 个体价值的实现,既需要外在的理性资源调节,又需要个体内在的自我超越.

sentences.en: Male urination really is a kind of accomplishment and an f transcendence.
sentences.cn: 男人尿尿的本事确实是一套本事,因为有其超越的弧度.

sentences.en: Once again, Jung sees the transcendence of opposites as the ideal.
sentences.cn: 再提一次, Jung超越相对之物的方法是将其视为等值.

sentences.en: Q's character contains two aspects: the national deep - rooted bad habits and self - transcendence.
sentences.cn: 阿Q的性格包括国民劣根性与 自我 超越性两个层面,后者是对前者的否定.

sentences.en: Surrender is the transcendence of ego and the release of control.
sentences.cn: 屈服即超越自我和摆脱束缚.

sentences.en: The Arab-American Society promotes the transcendence of racial and religious differences.
sentences.cn: 阿拉伯裔美国人协会促进了种族和宗教差异的超越。

sentences.en: The biggest happiness in life is realizing self - transcendence.
sentences.cn: 人生最大的幸福是实现对 自我 的超越.

sentences.en: The textual transcendence relies on interpreters'thought of and dialogue with the text.
sentences.cn: 文本超越则依赖于阐释者对文本的深刻反思与对话.

sentences.en: These are the tones of creation that will support your transcendence of issues surrounding divine union.
sentences.cn: 这些是将帮助你超越围绕神圣联盟有关问题的造物音调.

sentences.en: We have then to find not only a simple act of transcendence but a double inversion.
sentences.cn: 因此,我们不仅必须要找简单的超越之举,而且要能反其道而行.

sentences.en: Who lingers at the threshold of transcendence?

words.tran_cn: 卓越的；超常的；出类拔萃的
先验的；卓越的，[数] 超越的；超自然的
超越论者的，先验论者的

trans.tran_cn: 超越，超绝，<宗>（神的）超然性，超凡
trans.tran_en: Transcendence is the quality of being able to go beyond normal limits or boundaries
